text:
[Verse]
Whispers in the trees
Dancing in the breeze
Sunlight on the leaves
Song you can't believe

[Verse 2]
Footsteps on the ground
Magic all around
Mystery profound
Lost and then you're found

[Chorus]
Echoes in the forest
Calling out your name
Feel the heartbeat racing
Nothing is the same

[Verse 3]
Glowing fireflies
Lighting up the night
Stars are shining bright
Everything's alright

[Verse 4]
Nature's soft embrace
Wonders of this place
Can't forget the taste
Memories won't erase

[Bridge]
Every path you take
Feel the earth awake
Dreaming while you walk
Listen when it talks
title: Echoes in the Forest
